content:
I see that someone set up a Kamala HQ automated mirror account on Bluesky.  It mirrors posts from Twitter/X.  Given that many of us have moved from Twitter, has the Harris campaign considered creating an official Bluesky account?

https://bsky.app/profile/kamalahqrepeater.bsky.social
yeah I would be highly supportive of such an account
Same! There are some very active communities of journalists and activists over there
Same! I like BlueSky, seem to spend more time over there than anywhere other than Discord and Slack
This is my profile on it: https://bsky.app/profile/egall.bsky.social
Also don’t do FB or Twitter and have been following the  mirror!
We're not sure if they are doing this or not but as soon as we hear, if they do, we'll let everyone know.
Is there a widget that is a countdown to election night that we can add to our cell phones? I want to create a sense of urgency and thought this would help... but I'm not tech savvy.
Hi <@875421074320412672>  there several for webpages and blogs. but I can't find a phone widget. You could do this with regular countdown app, but it would't be personalized to the election.
